/usr/bin/c++   -g   CMakeFiles/singpert-aniso.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/singpert-aniso.dir/__/__/common/timer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/singpert-aniso.dir/__/__/common/error.cpp.o  -o singpert-aniso -rdynamic ../../src/libhermes3d-debug.so -lJudy -lumfpack -lamd -lblas -llapack -lblas -llapack -Wl,-rpath,/home/sri/hermes3d/src
